entities.name: Ariana Dumbledore
entities.description: Mentioned as the first person to die 'for the greater good' in a Dark rite. Excerpt: 'Is it possible that Ariana Dumbledore was the ﬁrst person to die “for the greater good”?'

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Reading a book with Hermione. Excerpt: 'The chapter ended here and Harry looked up.'

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Reading a book with Harry. Excerpt: 'She tugged the book out of Harry’s hands... She closed it without looking at it, as though hiding something'

entities.name: the two young men
entities.description: Mentioned as practicing for their attempt at glory and domination. Excerpt: 'as the two young men sat practicing for their attempt at glory and domination?'

relationships.description: Reading a book together. Excerpt: 'The chapter ended here and Harry looked up. Hermione had reached the bottom of the page before him.'
